External display.name: [BPSC2] External display - Model PD 7000
External display.description: TFT 7' LCD monitor, 20 characters by 3 lines, USB 2.0

10\" GUI.name: [BPSC2] Optional 10" display with high resolution GUI
10\" GUI.price: see price in Spare Parts Catalogue
10\" GUI.description: Optional 10" display with high resolution GUI (from R2.15 onwards)

Uninterrupted power supply (UPS).name: [BPSC2] UPS
Uninterrupted power supply (UPS).description: Required for regions with frequent power failures

GUI arm.name: [BPSC2] GUI arm - Standard
GUI arm.description: The mounting kit allows to attach the GUI to the BPS C2 enclosure (from R2.10 to R2.12)

GUI arm.name: [BPSC2] GUI arm - High resolution
GUI arm.description: The mounting kit allows to attach the High resolution GUI to the BPS C2 enclosure (from R2.15 onwards)

Stand.name: [BPSC2] GUI table stand with flexible angle adjustment
Stand.description: GUI table stand with flexible angle adjustment (only for high resolution GUI)

Multi currency package 2 - 5 currency.name: [BPSC2] Multi currency package 2-5
Multi currency package 2 - 5 currency.description: Processing of installed currencies in sequence. Applies only to available and released adaptations

Multi currency package 6 - 10 currency.name: [BPSC2] Multi currency package 6-10
Multi currency package 6 - 10 currency.description: Processing of installed currencies in sequence. Applies only to available and released adaptations. This multi currency package requires the installed package for 2-5 currencies

Multi currency package 11 - 30 currency.name: [BPSC2] Multi currency package 11-30
Multi currency package 11 - 30 currency.description: Processing of installed currencies in sequence. Applies only to available and released adaptations. This multi currency package requires the installed packages for 2-5, and 6-10 currencies

Multi currency package > 30 currencies.name: [BPSC2] Multi currency package > 30
Multi currency package > 30 currencies.description: Processing of installed currencies in sequence. Only applies to available and released adaptations. Up to 60 currencies are possible, depending on the complexity of the adaptations

Mixed currency processing.name: [BPSC2] Mixed currency processing
Mixed currency processing.description: Processing of up to 10 currencies simultaneously if they are already installed in a multi-currency package. Please note: Every combination needs to be tested upfront

Special commercial security features.name: [BPSC2] Special commercial security features
Special commercial security features.description: Some banknotes contain special features such as SICPA-Talk or have been issued by IBNS solutions. Many of such features can be detected. Licensing model: included in adaptation and per currency. This price is only valid for adaptations which have implemented the respective feature

Ticket reading.name: [BPSC2] Ticket reading
Ticket reading.description: Software function to read casino tickets by the sensor system and send data to a defined IP-address. 4 configurations: - Mixed processing of tickets and banknotes. Please note: BPS Connect Casino for prepping and reconciliation as well as a PC are not included in the price

Fast Deposit Processing (FDP).name: [BPSC2] Fast Deposit Processing (FDP), free of charge
Fast Deposit Processing (FDP).description: Software function to increase efficiency by 1-step process. The deposit data are entered via barcode reader directly at the system, banknotes are verified and sorted  in one run, rejects are processed offline to finally balance the deposit. Notice: A barcode reader is not included in the price and needs to be ordered separately. A license for cash management system is also not included in the price for the FDP option

Serial number reading.name: [BPSC2] Serial number reading
Serial number reading.description: Reads the serial number (SN) of banknotes incl. the possibility to either store it on the system or send the data as well as the image of the SN to a defined IP address or a connected USB stick. The system can also look for a specific SN in a search list which is stored on the machine

Serial number reading, comparison and co.name: [BPSC2] Serial number reading, comparison and consolidation (SNR, data export)
Serial number reading, comparison and co.description: Reads both serial number (SN) of banknotes (OCR) and compares them. If they are different, i.e. a suspected composed note the banknote will be sent to reject. If both SNs are equal the banknote will be stacked, and data sent to a defined IP address or a connected USB stick. The system can also look for a specific SN in a search list which is stored on the machine

Video surveillance interface and SNTP.name: [BPSC2] Video surveillance interface and SNTP, free of charge
Video surveillance interface and SNTP.description: XML report to connect the processing data of a particular deposit with the video stream of the surveillance supplier

BPS Config Optimizer.name: [BPSC2] BPS Config Optimizer, free of charge
BPS Config Optimizer.description: External application for customer PC (Windows) to change operation modes and machine configuration (e.g. reports, stacker capacity)
